reviews.review_msg: Absolute favorite professor! Nic is laidback, friendly, and very knowledgeable. Course was not heavy as it consisted of weekly questions, occasional assignments, and a take-home final (no papers), but still I felt very engaged and invested in everything that was being taught. I wish he taught more classes, would love to have him again!
Amazing prof. Interesting content, informative lectures, and caring professor. You can definitely tell that he's super passionate about Buddhist philosophy. Would 100% take Nic's class again.

Asian philosophy (which turned out to be Buddhist philosophy) was so good with Nic. I would 100% recommend him, there are weekly/biweekly assignments but they take 5 minutes after the readings, which only take an hour max every week. I really enjoyed his lectures, uses many different examples for each concept, so really easy to grasp. 10/10
